mapper.select: SELECT qna_tb.uid, qna_tb.title, qna_tb.content, qna_tb.password, qna_tb.write_date, qna_tb.category, user_tb.nickname, user_uid, product_uid, product_tb.name FROM qna_tb JOIN user_tb ON qna_tb.user_uid = user_tb.uid JOIN product_tb ON qna_tb.product_uid = product_tb.uid WHERE qna_tb.product_uid = #{productUid} AND deleteyn = 'n' ORDER BY qna_tb.write_date DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM qna_tb WHERE product_uid = #{productUid} AND deleteyn = 'n'

SELECT qna_tb.uid, qna_tb.title, qna_tb.content, qna_tb.password, qna_tb.write_date, qna_tb.category, user_tb.nickname, user_uid, product_uid, product_tb.name FROM qna_tb JOIN user_tb ON qna_tb.user_uid = user_tb.uid JOIN product_tb ON qna_tb.product_uid = product_tb.uid WHERE qna_tb.uid = #{uid} AND deleteyn = 'n'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna_tb(title, content, category, password, user_uid, product_uid) VALUES (#{title},#{content},#{category},#{password},#{userDTO.uid},#{productDTO.uid});
